title: Georgia Firm Recalls Pork Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 16, 2015 Heywoods Meat Haus & Provision Co., a Marietta, Georgia establishment, is recalling approximately 931 pounds of tasso (pork shoulder) products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products...
